articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Tongbong Co-op Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Tongbong Co-op Farm
Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Tongbong Cooperative Farm in Hamju County.
					 After being briefed on the scientific farming before an agro-technical diagram, he walked along the lane across the fields to learn in detail about the farming this year.
					
					 Watching the paddy fields where rice seedlings are growing healthy after taking roots and the non-paddy fields where potatoes are doing well, he expressed great satisfaction over a fine crop of potatoes the farm expects to harvest. 
					
					 The cosy modern houses of the farmers standing in rows at the sunny foot of a mountain and the fertile co-op farm land where the hum of farm machines at work is heard look like a picture, he said, adding that this is the spectacular appearance of socialist countryside in the DPRK.
					
					 Noting that the rapid progress of the three revolutions--ideological, technical and cultural--in rural areas, the increased aid to them and the strengthened state guidance to the co-op farms have resulted in speedily realizing the assimilation of farmers to the working class and industrializing agriculture and changing the appearance of the rural areas as the days go by, remarkably narrowing down the disparity between town and country, he stressed that this dramatic change clearly testifies to the validity and great vitality of the socialist rural theses authored by President Kim Il Sung and the advantageous socialist rural economy system in the DPRK.
					
					 He set out important tasks to be fulfilled by the farm.
					
					 He said that if the Tongbong Co-op Farm situated on the east coast is to reap a high and secure yield of crops, it is necessary to intensify the scientific researches into overcoming the unfavorable weather conditions there where damage by cold weather is severe and the rate of hours of sunshine is low to establish a cultivation system suited to those conditions.
					
					 The basic way of decisively increasing the grain production is to sharply raise the per-hectare crop yield, he stressed, adding that it is necessary to steadily improve the fertility of soil and, at the same time, put farming on a scientific and technological basis as required by the Juche methods of farming.
					
					 In order to free the farmers from hard work and satisfactorily solve the acute shortage of manpower to keep pace with the rising level of intensive farming and agricultural scientization it is essential to realize the comprehensive mechanization, he noted, emphasizing that to this end it is necessary to boost the utility rate of farm machines and, at the same time, produce and supply more efficient machines to the farms.
					
					 Pointing out that the agricultural front is one of the major fronts for building a great prosperous and powerful nation, he called on the whole country and all the people to continue directing all efforts to farming to bring about a signal turn in the agricultural production.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and belief that the officials and members of the farm would successfully play a vanguard role in implementing the Party's agriculture-first policy and thus set an example in farming on the east coast.
					
					 He was accompanied by Secretary Kim Ki Nam and Department Directors Jang Song Thaek and Pak Nam Gi of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Confrontation Racket Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Confrontation Racket Blasted
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea in a statement Saturday dismissed the Lee Myung Bak group's recent racket for inciting confrontation with the DPRK backed by the "story about a military provocation" in the West Sea.
					 The story floated by the group is nothing but sheer sophism to justify its war moves, shift in advance the responsibility for possible armed conflict on to the DPRK and divert elsewhere the south Koreans' bitter criticism of the present regime, the statement says, and goes on:
					
					 It was none other than the south Korean warmongers who declared a war against the DPRK by openly announcing their full participation in the aggressive and illegal PSI despite the unanimous opposition of all Koreans and the public at home and abroad.
					
					 As the DPRK solemnly declared in its statements in the past, it will strongly react to the provocateurs with practical counteractions and mete out unimaginable and merciless punishment to them.
					
					 The puppets' military provocation and war moves will be shattered to smithereens in face of the DPRK's merciless strikes and the so-called "northern limit line" will become a pronoun symbolic of bitter defeat and tragic death of aggressors and provocateurs.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group had better stop its rash acts, properly understanding who its rival is.

articles.title: Senior Officials of DPRK Visit Kalma Theatre
articles.content:
Senior Officials of DPRK Visit Kalma Theatre 
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials and leading officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Cabinet, ministries, national institutions and Kangwon Province and Wonsan City on Saturday visited the Kalma Theatre and enjoyed a performance given by members of art groups of families of servicemen.
					 The visitors went to the Kalma Theatre newly built at the Kalma Rest Home of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 They was briefed on the fact that General Secretary Kim Jong Il saw to it that the theatre was built as a monumental edifice of the era.
					
					 Then they enjoyed a performance given by the members of art groups of families of servicemen who participated in the second round of the second-term contest among art groups of families of KPA servicemen.
					
					 In poem and story-telling "Footsteps of Sun-like Generals of Mt. Paektu," poem and song "Song of Noble Patriotism," quartet "Cuckoo on the Road to the Front," sketch "Wife of Serviceperson on Outpost" and other numbers, the performers highly sang of the great efforts and undying feats of Kim Jong Il, who is ushering in the great heyday of national prosperity, demonstrating the strength of socialist Korea with his outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership, and well represented the intense loyalty and ardent reverence of servicepersons' families for the great illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Performance of Schoolchildren's Art Festival Given
articles.content:
Performance of Schoolchildren's Art Festival Given
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- A performance of the 48th national schoolchildren's art festival was given at the Pyongyang Schoolchildren's Palace on Saturday.
					They put on the stage Oungum ensemble "The Generalissimo Talks beside Me" which represented the ardent yearning of the schoolchildren across the country for President Kim Il Sung, etc. and accordion concert "Song of Best Wishes," an immortal classic masterpiece, singing high praises of the revolutionary exploits of General Secretary Kim Jong Il who carves out a bright future of the country and other colorful numbers.    
					
					 They also staged dance "Small Drum Band of Our Subbranch of the Children's Union" and other numbers representing the children growing to be heroes and doctors of the future, their hopes in full bloom. 
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience. 
					
					 Among the audience were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and others.

articles.title: Wreath Laid before Liberation Tower
articles.content:
Wreath Laid before Liberation Tower
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- The Russian State Academic Igor Moiseyev Dance Company headed by its Director Elena Scherbakova laid a wreath before the Liberation Tower on Saturday.
					 After laying the wreath in the name of the company, the participants paid silent tribute to fallen soldiers of the Soviet Army. 
					
					The dance company arrived here on same day.

articles.title: DPRK-Iran Football Match Held
articles.content:
DPRK-Iran Football Match Held
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- The second football match between the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and Iran, 2010 FIFA World Cup Asian Qualifiers, was held at Yanggakdo Football Stadium in Pyongyang on June 6.
					 The match ended in a draw with no score.

articles.title: Legends of Love for Rising Generations
articles.content:
Legends of Love for Rising Generations
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- The politics for the future has produced many legends of love for the rising generation in the DPRK.
					 President Kim Il Sung set up Children's Corps schools in guerrilla zones in the years of the sanguinary anti-Japanese war, saying that the rising generation is the flower of the class, nation and humankind and it is a sacred duty of the revolutionaries to bring them up well.
					
					 Although he put on unlined clothes in winter, he took measures to provide members of the Children's Corps with padded winter clothes and comfortable beds and to make new clothes for the members of the Children's Corps in Maanshan with 20 yuan given to him by his mother as an inheritance. Boundless was such love shown by the President for the younger generation.
					
					 He placed the matter of children's pencil on the agenda of the First Session of the Provisional People's Committee of North Korea after the liberation of the country. When he saw a barefoot boy on the way of field guidance, he called at his house and bought shoes for him. He donated his saved living expenses to the construction of a school in Hyangsan County.
					
					 In accordance with his outlook on the rising generation, the state built schools for bereaved children of patriotic martyrs and orphanages across the country and the schools did not suspend lessons during the Fatherland Liberation War. In the postwar rehabilitation and construction, too, the priority was given to the construction of schools, students and children's palaces, students and children's halls and children's camps.
					
					 Saying that he was very happy when he was among children, the President watched schoolchildren's New Year performances for scores of years. He acquainted himself with the supply of the new school uniforms to the students at the historical consultation meeting of officials in the economic sectors in July Juche 83 (1994), the last days of his life, and expressed great satisfaction. Indeed, he was the true father of the younger generation.
					
					 Under the leadership of Kim Jong Il who is identical to the President, similar legends of love for the rising generation are being created without let-up in the DPRK.
					
					 While finding himself on the way of frontline inspection in the "Arduous March" and the forced march, he let camping flags fly on the poles of the children's camps and saw to it that the facilities of the bean-milk factories were replaced with modern ones and bean-milk-carrying vans were sent for the children.
					
					 He took a measure to send specimens of animals and plants prepared by servicepersons of the Korean Peopleâ€™s Army to educational sectors, inspected a class at work at the Mubong Secondary School in Samjiyon County and sent educational apparatuses to the Sojung Secondary School in Rakwon County some time ago.
					
					 Greeting the 63rd anniversary of the foundation of the Korean Children's Union (June 6, 1946) the KCU members are making up their minds to carry forward the lineage of the Juche-oriented revolution.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Full Participation in PSI under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Full Participation in PSI under Fire
Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group's full participation in the PSI is a wanton violation of the DPRK's sovereignty and an open declaration of a war against it. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed commentary.
					
					 The PSI cooked up by the U.S. is a brigandish mechanism for a war of aggression as it is designed to check and inspect ships or planes, etc. of any country suspected of carrying nuclear weapons or missiles and other WMDs and the DPRK is made its main target, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Lee group openly joined its American master in his criminal scenario by declaring its full participation in the PSI. This is the thrice-cursed act of treachery as it endangers the destiny of the nation by blindly following outside forces in disregard of the sovereignty and dignity of fellow countrymen.
					
					 The DPRK never compromises with those who infringe upon its sovereignty, refusing to recognize it and ignoring it, but settle accounts with them to the last. 
					
					 It is ridiculous, indeed, for the Lee group to dare challenge the DPRK's sovereignty by fully participating in the PSI in reliance upon outside forces' "strength."
					
					 Unimaginable are the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by the above-said action of the group. It may spark off an armed conflict and an all-out war any time.
					
					 The Lee group will be wholly accountable for the above-mentioned disastrous consequences as it has followed foreign forces in utter disregard of the DPRK's sovereignty and dignity.

articles.title: Anniversary of KCU Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of KCU Observed
Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- The Korean people foresee a rosy future of Songun Korea in the appearance of the fine juvenile revolutionaries firmly preparing themselves as dependable successors to the revolution while devotedly defending General Secretary Kim Jong Il anywhere and any time, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an editorial dedicated to the 63rd anniversary of the foundation of the Korean Children's Union.
					 The KCU has traversed the road of the praiseworthy struggle under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the editorial says, and goes on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung worked heart and soul to develop the juvenile movement from long ago in order to train the rising generation to be dependable successors to the revolution. It was the President who founded the Saenal Children's Union right after he embarked upon the road of revolution and established the glorious tradition of the Juche-based juvenile movement. He founded the KCU, the successor to the tradition of the anti-Japanese Children's Corps on June 6, Juche 35 (1946). This marked a significant event which laid a new landmark in strengthening the Juche-based juvenile movement and steadily advancing the Korean revolution generation after generation. He made sure that the pencil issue was discussed as the item of the agenda of the first meeting of the Provisional People's Committee of North Korea after the liberation of the country and a children's camp was built on a picturesque shore of the East Sea at a time when the situation of the country was so difficult after the war.
					
					  These facts clearly indicate what profound loving care he showed for the children, the future of the country. He attended the 5th Congress of the KCU and bestowed such honor upon the members of the KCU as having a picture taken with them and showed his boundless loving care for the children till the last moments of his life. This loving care will always be remembered by the Korean people. 
					
					 The undying feats performed by him in strengthening the Korean juvenile movement continue shining brilliantly under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He published many works including "On Improving Guidance of Children's Union Work" and led the work of the KCU with warm care. Bean-based milk vans associated with his loving care run along streets of the capital on a regular basis and there sprang up modern bases for training computer talents, bases for extracurricular education and children's camps during the "Arduous March" when everything was in short supply. This would be unthinkable without his noble view on the future of the country as he spares nothing for the younger generation. The members of the KCU are stoutly growing to be the reserves of the Songun revolution, their hopes in full bloom under such profound loving care.

articles.title: Puppet Traitor's Unpopular Rule Slammed
articles.content:
Puppet Traitor's Unpopular Rule Slammed
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- More than 30 civic and social organizations of south Korea including the Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society and the Federation of Women's Organizations held a meeting of their representatives on the situation on June 2 to denounce traitor Lee Myung Bak for his unpopular rule, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 They charged that the Lee regime's undemocratic policy characterized by its highhanded and arbitrary practices and violence brought the present ruling crisis.
					
					 They demanded the "government" stop at once the moves to railroad "Lee Myung Bak evil bills" including the "bill on media" through the "National Assembly" and guarantee the democratic rights to the people from all walks of life.
					
					 Vowing to energetically struggle to realize democratization, they declared that for the present they would successfully hold a large rally on June 10 on the occasion of the anniversary of the June popular resistance.

articles.title: Unity for Democracy Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Unity for Democracy Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- The Government Employees' Union, the Government Employees' Union for Democracy and the Court Employees' Union of south Korea called a joint press conference in Seoul on June 3 at which they vowed to go united to put an end to the group of traitors' irregularities and corruption and realize the democratization of the society, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 In a press release the organizations recalled that the three unions agreed on their merger, saying that this agreement amounts to the first step for boosting the unity among government employees.
					
					 They declared that they would pool efforts to put an end to the Lee Myung Bak group's irregularities and corruption and realize reforms and the democratization of the society.

articles.title: WPK Praised by Italian Figure
articles.content:
WPK Praised by Italian Figure
Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- Miriam Pelegrini Feri, president of the Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy, issued a statement titled "Ever-Victorious Workers' Party of Korea" on May 30 on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the WPK.
					 The statement said that the Korean people have achieved great successes in building a socialist economic power full of conviction and optimism about victory, overcoming all sorts of trials and difficulties, adding that the key to these achievements lies in that they hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the supreme leader of the WPK. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il laid down a programme on modeling the whole society on the Juche idea long ago, achieving the single-minded unity of the party, the army and the people, and is now leading the Korean people's drive for building a thriving nation to victory, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il the WPK has waged a vigorous struggle to defend the sovereignty of the nation and achieve the independent reunification of the country and the human cause of independence, performing such world-startling miracle as the satellite launch.
					
					 The eye-catching successes achieved by the WPK in building man-centered socialism of Korean style under his leadership are greatly encouraging the progressive political parties and people in the world in their efforts to construct a new society and accomplish the cause of socialism.

articles.title: Bulletin Released by Mexican Organization
articles.content:
Bulletin Released by Mexican Organization
Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism published bulletin No. 23 on the occasions of the 9th anniversary of the announcement of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the month of June 25-July 27 anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Leader Kim Jong Il lays down firm stand of independence on the cause of national reunification" said that the Korean people has dynamically advanced the cause of national reunification, foiling every challenge and move of the separatist forces inside and outside south Korea under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself," the banner of independence. 
					
					 The bulletin recalled that Kim Jong Il in his work "Let Us Struggle Resolutely to Implement the Three Principles of National Reunification" made public on July 14, 1972 called for firmly adhering to the three principles of national reunification under any difficult and complicated situation in the future and carrying on the struggle for national reunification strictly on these principles.
					
					 Kim Jong Il said that what is the most important for observing the above-mentioned principles is to hold aloft the banner of independence, the bulletin noted, adding that the cause of national reunification is sure to be accomplished thanks to the firm independent stand clarified by him.
					
					 No matter how desperately the anti-reunification forces challenge and obstruct the cause of Korean reunification, all Koreans will surely accomplish it under the banner of "By our nation itself," declared the bulletin. 
					
					 The bulletin edited a photo of the Three Charters for National Reunification Memorial Tower.

articles.title: Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Centenary of Birth of Kim Il Sung to Be Commemorated in Democratic Congo
Pyongyang, June 6 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of Democratic Congo was inaugurated on May 28 to commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The deputy secretary general of the People's Party of the Reconstruction and the Democracy of Democratic Congo who is member of the parliament was elected honorary chairman of the preparatory committee and Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo, elected chairman of the committee at its inaugural ceremony.
					
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo said in his speech made at the ceremony that the people of Democratic Congo would join the world progressive people in extensively holding political and cultural events to commemorate the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung and waging widespread movements supporting the just cause of the Korean people. 
					
					 The ceremony discussed an action program ending in 2012.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de concursantes de unidades del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia funcion de concursantes de unidades del EPC
Pyongyang, 6 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio junto con los oficiales y soldados del EPC la funcion de los grupos artisticos de las esposas de oficiales de la Unidad No.583 del EPC y la Unidad No.3154 de la Guarnicion Popular de Corea quienes participan en el segundo concurso del segundo periodo de los grupos de ese tipo.
					  En el repertorio de la ocasion estuvieron varias piezas de diferentes generos como la cancion acompanada de Kayagum (instrumento musical nacional de Corea) "Almas siguiendo al General", la poesia en dialogo "Nos encontraremos con el General Padre en Huichon", la narracion y coro pequeno "Nos vemos en el frente".
					
					  Las ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico la digna vida de si mismas que llevan una vida autentica en el regazo del gran General Insigne y exteriorizaron su ferrea conviccion y voluntad, su espiritu revolucionario e indoblegable impetu de defender a costa de la vida junto con sus esposos a la Direccion de la Revolucion y realizar todos los esfuerzos fisicos y espirituales por el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					  El Dirigente se mostro muy satisfecho de que ellas ofrecieron esa magnifica funcion que se ha desarrollado vertiginosamente a base de los exitos ideo-artisticos acumulados en el pasado y expreso agradecimiento a ellas apreciando mucho sus exitos logrados en la ocasion.
					
					  Destaco que son muy excelentes el mundo espiritual y el modo de lucha y vida de ellas quienes viven de manera combativa muy convencidas y optimistas del futuro.
					
					  Apunto que el segundo concurso del segundo periodo de los grupos artisticos de las esposas de los oficiales del EPC, que tuvo lugar despertando gran expectativa y atencion del ejercito y el pueblo, manifesto evidentemente la justeza y la vitalidad de la orientacion literario-artistica del partido de popularizar el arte y el aspecto orgulloso de la nueva cultura creada en la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					  Evaluo de altos los meritos de todas las concursantes quienes contribuyeron mucho a hacer reinar el impetu revolucionario en toda la sociedad participando en el presente concurso con su extraordinario entusiasmo, y les envio saludo cordial.
					
					  Destacando que por su gran vitalidad, esa cita artistica nacida en la epoca del Songun deviene una de las potentes fuerzas motrices que estimulan al ejercito y al pueblo a la lucha por cumplir la causa de construccion de una gran potencia prospera, presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para desarrollar las actividades artisticas masivas de caracter popular.
					
					  Le acompanaron el jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, general de ejercito Ri Yong Ho, el primer subjefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, general de ejercito Kim Jong Gak, los generales de ejercito del EPC, Kim Won Hong y Hyon Chol Hae, el coronel general Han Tong Gun y otros miembros directivos del ejercito, el secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek y Pak Nam Gi, y otros cuadros del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige fabricas y empresas de Tanchon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige fabricas y empresas de Tanchon
Pyongyang, 6 de junio (ATCC) -- El Dirigente  Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio en el terreno las fabricas y empresas de la ciudad de Tanchon.
					  El estuvo primero en la Fabrica de Magnesia de Tanchon.
					
					  Guiado por los funcionarios directivos de la fabrica, recorrio ante todo el monumento a la visita de orientacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y la sala de presentacion del historial.
					
					Tras recordar con profunda emocion la trayectoria orgullosa de la fabrica, dijo que bajo la sabia direccion y atencion minuciosa del Presidente, ella se convirtio en una macro-base combinada de produccion de materiales refractarios y subrayo que las inmortales hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente brillaran eternamente en los anales de la patria.
					
					Acto seguido, se cercioro del estado de equipos tecnicos y produccion pasando revista a los procesos productivos como el taller de fusion.
					
					  Aprecio mucho los exitos logrados por los obreros de la fabrica en el pasado mostrandose muy satisfecho de que ellos hicieron gran aporte al desarrollo industrial del pais aumentando incesantemente la produccion del clinker de magnesia de buena calidad y especialmente, realizan este trabajo segun metodos autoctonos, al luchar tenazmente guardando en el corazon el legado del Presidente de desarrollar en gran escala la autoctona industria del clinker de magnesia.
					
					Tiene buenas perspectivas de desarrollo esa industria fundada por el Presidente porque se basa en la inagotable fuente de materias primas, alta tecnologia y abundantes experiencias, destaco.
					
					Anadio que se debe seguir intensificando la investigacion cientifica de esa rama y organizar escrupulosamente la produccion para producir mayor cantidad de varios materiales refractarios y magnesia ligeramente cocida.
					
					A continuacion, el Dirigente se traslado a la Fundicion de Metales No Ferrosos de Tanchon reconstruida modernamente.
					
					Despues de escuchar las explicaciones sobre los problemas tecnicos resueltos ahi por cuenta propia, estuvo en la sala de mando general de la produccion y otros lugares averiguando en detalles el estado de produccion.
					
					Elogio mucho los meritos de los obreros de ahi poniendose muy complacido de que despues de edificar magnificamente esta fundicion ultramoderna, ellos lograron un brillante progreso tecnico al desarrollar activamente el movimiento por la innovacion tecnica.
					
					Diciendo que la Fundicion de Metales No Ferrosos de Tanchon, que abrio la brecha amplia del auge productivo al desarrollar continuamente la tecnologia, es una fabrica ejemplar en lo cientifico-tecnico, recalco que la orgullosa transformacion de ella constituye un manifiesto patente de la justeza y vitalidad de la orientacion de nuestro partido sobre la revolucion tecnica. 
					
					Presento las tareas que incumben a esta empresa senalando que ella ocupa un lugar importante en la construccion de una potencia economica.
					
					Mas tarde, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il dirigio en el terreno la Fabrica de Maquinas de Minas de Tanchon.
					
					Tras escuchar explicaciones ante el plano de la fabrica, se entero en detalles del estado de construccion y equipos tecnicos recorriendo los procesos productivos como el taller de elaboracion de gran dimension y el de paileria bajo techo asi como los establecimientos culturales y de servicio publico edificados confortablemente.
					
					  La clase obrera de esta planta, que habia fabricado desde el cero muchas maquinas herramientas en el dificil tiempo posbelico, termino con brillantez la modernizacion de la fabrica con el espiritu y temperamento de aquel tiempo, destaco y prosiguio que esto es una muestra directa del espiritu revolucionario de los obreros coreanos, combatientes dispuestos a implementar a costa de la vida cualquier cosa, por muy dificil que fuera, que les pida el partido.
					
					Senalo que las modernas fabricas y empresas acondicionadas en la ciudad de Tanchon son la parte reducida del orgulloso aspecto de la industria autoctona en que se realiza brillantemente la transformacion tecnica general basada en las tecnologias de punta.
					
					Gracias a la solida base industrial al estilo coreano,  avanzamos victoriosamente sin vacilacion alguna ante cualquier fluctuacion economica de alcance global y es definitiva la victoria de la causa de construccion de una gran potencia prospera, subrayo.
					
					Entre los acompanantes del Dirigente figuraban el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek.

articles.title: CNCDP desmiente el "rumor de provocacion militar"
articles.content:
CNCDP desmiente el "rumor de provocacion militar"
  Pyongyang, 6 de junio (ATCC) -- En relacion con que la banda de Lee Myung Bak libra la campana conflictiva con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea difundiendo en estos dias el "rumor de la supuesta provocacion militar" en el Mar Oeste, el portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) hizo publica el dia 6 la declaracion condenatoria que sigue:
					  El "rumor de la supuesta provocacion militar" en el Mar Oeste, que circula la pandilla de Lee, no pasa de ser una sofisteria para justificar sus maniobras belicistas, imputar de antemano a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea la responsabilidad del eventual conflicto armado y distraer la atencion de los habitantes surcoreanos enfadados con el actual "regimen".
					
					  Al anunciar abiertamente la participacion total en la "Iniciativa de Seguridad contra la Proliferacion" (PSI en ingles) a pesar del unanime rechazo de toda la nacion y la opinion publica interna y externa, los belicistas surcoreanos declararon la guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					  Como ya hemos declarado solemnemente en las anteriores declaraciones, responderemos con las rotundas y practicas medidas de accion a los provocadores que seran sometidos al castigo inimaginable e implacable.
					
					  La provocaron militar y las maniobras belicistas de los titeres surcoreanos se estrellaran contra nuestro ataque implacable y la llamada "linea de limite al Norte" en el Mar Oeste sera el pronombre de amarga derrota y tragica muerte de los agresores y provocadores.
					
					  La banda titere del Sur de Corea debe actuar con prudencia sabiendo bien con quien se enfrenta.

articles.title: Cuadros ven en el Teatro Kalma la funcion de las concursantes del EPC
articles.content:
Cuadros ven en el Teatro Kalma la funcion de las concursantes del EPC
Pyongyang, 7 de junio (ATCC) -- Los cuadros del Partido y el Estado y los funcionarios directivos del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Consejo de Ministros, ministerios, organos centrales, la provincia de Kangwon y la ciudad de Wonsan visitaron el dia 6 el Teatro Kalma y vieron aqui la funcion de los grupos artisticos de las esposas de oficiales del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					  Ellos recorrieron primero el Teatro Kalma nuevamente construido en el recinto de la Casa de Reposo homonima del EPC.
					
					  Ellos escucharon la explicacion de que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il hizo edificar ese teatro como creacion monumental de la epoca.
					
					  A continuacion, vieron la funcion de los grupos artisticos de las esposas de oficiales del EPC participantes en el 2o concurso del segundo periodo de los mismos.
					
					 Las ejecutantes pusieron en la escena la poesia y narracion "Pasos de los Generales del monte Paektu iguales al Sol", la poesia y cancion "Noble patriotismo", el cuarteto vocal "Cuco en el camino al frente", el drama corto "Esposa de la vanguardia" y otras piezas que describen emotivamente los enormes esfuerzos y las imborrables hazanas del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien trae la era de prosperidad de la patria manifestando el poderio nacional de la Corea socialista con su extraordinaria direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, y la febril fidelidad y veneracion de los familiares de los uniformados a este gran General Insigne del Paektu.
